Usage¶

freyja¶

freyja [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options

--version¶

Show the version and exit.

aggregate¶

Aggregates all the outputs Aggregates all the outputs

Arguments:
param results:

used to pass result files

param ext:

used to pass extension of the files

param output:

used to define output file name

:return : an aggregated tsv file

Aggregates all the outputs

Arguments:
param results:

used to pass result files

param ext:

used to pass extension of the files

param output:

used to define output file name

:return : an aggregated tsv file

freyja aggregate [OPTIONS] RESULTS

Options

--ext <ext>¶

file extension option

Default:

-1

--output <output>¶

Output file

Default:

aggregated_result.tsv

Arguments

RESULTS¶

Required argument

barcode-build¶

Building barcodes from a global tree

freyja barcode-build [OPTIONS]

Options

--pb <pb>¶

protobuf tree

--outdir <outdir>¶

Output directory save updated files

--noncl¶

only include lineages in cov-lineages

Default:

True

boot¶

Perform bootstrapping method for freyja

freyja boot [OPTIONS] VARIANTS DEPTHS

Options

--nb <nb>¶

number of bootstraps

Default:

100

--nt <nt>¶

max number of cpus to use

Default:

1

--eps <eps>¶

minimum abundance to include

Default:

0.001

--barcodes <barcodes>¶

custom barcode file

Default:

-1

--meta <meta>¶

custom lineage metadata file

Default:

-1

--output_base <output_base>¶

Output file basename

Default:

test

--boxplot <boxplot>¶

file format of boxplot output (e.g. pdf or png)

Default:

--confirmedonly¶
Default:

False

--rawboots¶

return raw bootstraps

Default:

False

--lineageyml <lineageyml>¶

lineage hierarchy file

--depthcutoff <depthcutoff>¶

exclude sites with coverage depth below this value andgroup identical barcodes

Default:

0

Arguments

VARIANTS¶

Required argument

DEPTHS¶

Required argument

covariants¶

finds co-variants (mutations co-occurring on the same read pair)

freyja covariants [OPTIONS] INPUT_BAM [MIN_SITE] [MAX_SITE]

Options

--output <output>¶

path to save co-occurring mutations

Default:

covariants.tsv

--ref-genome <ref_genome>¶
Default:

/Users/dpilz/Desktop/Freyja/freyja/data/NC_045512_Hu-1.fasta

--gff-file <gff_file>¶

path to gff file corresponding to reference genome. If included, outputs amino acid mutations in addition to nucleotide mutations.

--min_quality <min_quality>¶

minimum quality for a base to be considered

Default:

20

--min_count <min_count>¶

minimum count for a set of mutations to be saved

Default:

10

--spans_region¶

if included, consider only reads that span the region defined by (min_site, max_site)

Default:

False

--sort_by <sort_by>¶

method by which to sort covariants patterns. Set to “count” or “freq” to sort patterns by count or frequency (in descending order). Set to “site” to sort patterns by start site (n ascending order).

Default:

count

Arguments

INPUT_BAM¶

Required argument

MIN_SITE¶

Optional argument

MAX_SITE¶

Optional argument

dash¶

freyja dash [OPTIONS] AGG_RESULTS METADATA TITLE INTRO

Options

--thresh <thresh>¶

min lineage abundance included

Default:

0.01

--headerColor <headercolor>¶

color of header

Default:

#2fdcf5

--bodyColor <bodycolor>¶

color of body

Default:

#ffffff

--scale_by_viral_load¶

scale by viral load

Default:

False

--nboots <nboots>¶

Number of Bootstrap iterations

Default:

1000

--serial_interval <serial_interval>¶

Serial Interval

Default:

5.5

--config <config>¶

path to yaml file

--mincov <mincov>¶

min genome coverage included

Default:

60.0

--output <output>¶

Output html file

Default:

mydashboard.html

--days <days>¶

N Days used for growth calc

Default:

56

--grthresh <grthresh>¶

min avg prev. for growth

Default:

0.001

--lineageyml <lineageyml>¶

lineage hierarchy file

Default:

-1

--keep_plot_files¶

Keep separate plot

Default:

False

Arguments

AGG_RESULTS¶

Required argument

METADATA¶

Required argument

TITLE¶

Required argument

INTRO¶

Required argument

demix¶

Generate prevalence of lineages per sample

freyja demix [OPTIONS] VARIANTS DEPTHS

Options

--eps <eps>¶

minimum abundance to include

Default:

0.001

--barcodes <barcodes>¶

custom barcode file

Default:

-1

--meta <meta>¶

custom lineage metadata file

Default:

-1

--output <output>¶

Output file

Default:

demixing_result.csv

--covcut <covcut>¶

depth cutoff for coverage estimate

Default:

10

--confirmedonly¶
Default:

False

--version¶
Default:

False

--depthcutoff <depthcutoff>¶

exclude sites with coverage depth below this value andgroup identical barcodes

Default:

0

--lineageyml <lineageyml>¶

lineage hierarchy file

Default:

-1

--adapt <adapt>¶

adaptive lasso penalty parameter

Default:

0.0

--a_eps <a_eps>¶

adaptive lasso parameter, hard threshold

Default:

1e-08

--region_of_interest <region_of_interest>¶

JSON file containingregion(s) of interest for which to compute additional coverageestimates

Default:

-1

Arguments

VARIANTS¶

Required argument

DEPTHS¶

Required argument

extract¶

extracts reads containing mutation of interest

freyja extract [OPTIONS] QUERY_MUTATIONS INPUT_BAM

Options

--output <output>¶

path to save extracted reads

Default:

extracted.bam

--same_read¶

include to specify that query reads must all occur on the same read

Default:

False

Arguments

QUERY_MUTATIONS¶

Required argument

INPUT_BAM¶

Required argument

filter¶

excludes reads containing one or more mutations

freyja filter [OPTIONS] QUERY_MUTATIONS INPUT_BAM [MIN_SITE] [MAX_SITE]

Options

--output <output>¶

path to save filtered reads

Default:

filtered.bam

Arguments

QUERY_MUTATIONS¶

Required argument

INPUT_BAM¶

Required argument

MIN_SITE¶

Optional argument

MAX_SITE¶

Optional argument

plot¶

create plots using the outputs create plots using the outputs

Arguments:
param agg_results:

used to pass result files

param lineages:

used to provide a lineage specific breakdown

param times:

used to pass ample collection time information

param interval:

used to pass ample collection time information

param windowsize:

used to pass width of the rolling average window

param config:

allows users to control the colors and grouping of lineages in the plot

param mincov:

used to pass minimum genome coverage

param output:

used to specify the output name

param lineageyml:

used to pass a custom lineage hierarchy file

param thresh:

used to pass a minum lineage abundance

param writegrouped:

used for path to grouped lineage data

:return : an aggregated tsv file

create plots using the outputs

Arguments:
param agg_results:

used to pass result files

param lineages:

used to provide a lineage specific breakdown

param times:

used to pass ample collection time information

param interval:

used to pass ample collection time information

param windowsize:

used to pass width of the rolling average window

param config:

allows users to control the colors and grouping of lineages in the plot

param mincov:

used to pass minimum genome coverage

param output:

used to specify the output name

param lineageyml:

used to pass a custom lineage hierarchy file

param thresh:

used to pass a minum lineage abundance

param writegrouped:

used for path to grouped lineage data

:return : an aggregated tsv file

freyja plot [OPTIONS] AGG_RESULTS

Options

--lineages¶
Default:

False

--times <times>¶
Default:

-1

--interval <interval>¶
Default:

MS

--config <config>¶

path to yaml file

--mincov <mincov>¶

min genome coverage included

Default:

60.0

--output <output>¶

Output file

Default:

mix_plot.pdf

--windowsize <windowsize>¶
Default:

14

--lineageyml <lineageyml>¶

lineage hierarchy file

Default:

-1

--thresh <thresh>¶

min lineage abundance included

Default:

0.01

--writegrouped <writegrouped>¶

path to write grouped lineage data

Default:

-1

Arguments

AGG_RESULTS¶

Required argument

plot-covariants¶

Plot covariants output

freyja plot-covariants [OPTIONS] COVARIANTS

Options

--output <output>¶
Default:

covariants_plot.pdf

--num_clusters <num_clusters>¶

number of clusters to plot (sorted by frequency)

Default:

10

--min_mutations <min_mutations>¶

minimum number of mutations in a cluster to be plotted

Default:

1

--nt_muts¶

if included, include nucleotide mutations in x-labels

Default:

False

--vmin <vmin>¶

minimum value for colorbar (log scale)

Default:

-5

--vmax <vmax>¶

maximum value for colorbar (log scale)

Default:

0

Arguments

COVARIANTS¶

Required argument

relgrowthrate¶

generates relative growth rate for each lineage

freyja relgrowthrate [OPTIONS] AGG_RESULTS METADATA

Options

--thresh <thresh>¶

min lineage abundance in plot

Default:

0.01

--scale_by_viral_load¶

scale by viral load

Default:

False

--nboots <nboots>¶

Number of Bootstrap iterations

Default:

1000

--serial_interval <serial_interval>¶

Serial Interval

Default:

5.5

--config <config>¶

path to yaml file

--mincov <mincov>¶

min genome coverage included

Default:

60.0

--output <output>¶

Output html file

Default:

rel_growth_rates.csv

--days <days>¶

N Days used for growth calc

Default:

56

--grthresh <grthresh>¶

min avg prev. for growth

Default:

0.001

--lineageyml <lineageyml>¶

lineage hierarchy file

Default:

-1

Arguments

AGG_RESULTS¶

Required argument

METADATA¶

Required argument

update¶

Updates the lineage information using the latest outbreak data

freyja update [OPTIONS]

Options

--outdir <outdir>¶

Output directory save updated files

Default:

-1

--noncl¶

only include lineages in cov-lineages

Default:

True

--buildlocal¶

Perform barcode building locally

Default:

False

variants¶

Perform variant calling using samtools and ivar

freyja variants [OPTIONS] BAMFILE

Options

--ref <ref>¶

Reference

Default:

/Users/dpilz/Desktop/Freyja/freyja/data/NC_045512_Hu-1.fasta

--variants <variants>¶

Variant call output file

--depths <depths>¶

Sequencing depth output file

--refname <refname>¶

Ref name (for bams with multiple sequences)

Default:

--minq <minq>¶

Minimum base quality score

Default:

20

--annot <annot>¶

AA annotation output

Default:

Arguments

BAMFILE¶

Required argument

Freyja
